17  class Console : public QObject
18  {
19  Q_OBJECT
20  public:
21  explicit Console (QObject *parent = 0) :
22  QObject(parent),
23  notifier(STDIN_FILENO, QSocketNotifier::Read)
24  {
25  connect(&notifier, &QSocketNotifier::activated, this, &Console::text);
26  }
